titles.title: House Speaker's Staff Reduction Act
To reduce the Speaker of the House's spending on salaries and expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

bill.summary: 2/2/1994--Introduced. House Speaker's Staff Reduction Act - Reduces the appropriation for staff salaries and expenses of the Speaker of the House of Representatives by 20 percent beginning in FY 1995. Requires a reduction of at least $280,000 and places a $1,115,000 ceiling on the Speaker's spending for staff salaries and expenses.
